author: Rebekah Riess
title: California utility company says its equipment may have sparked a Los Angeles-area wildfire - CNN
description: California utility company Southern California Edison on Thursday said its equipment “may be associated with” the ignition of the Hurst Fire, which burned alongside the Eaton and Palisades fires during January’s Los Angeles firestorms.
content: California utility company Southern California Edison on Thursday said its equipment may be associated with the ignition of the Hurst Fire, which burned alongside the Eaton and Palisades fires during… [+2469 chars]
